root.name: The Sims 3: Outdoor Living Stuff
root.description: The Sims 3 Outdoor Stuff is the Third Stuff Pack exclusive to The Sims 3. This new Pack gives unique oppotunities to fully create a dream Outdoor Area for Your Sims' Homes...New Features:New Lounge ChairsNew Styled Hot TubsNew texture ChangesNew look ToolsStylish Outdoor Kitchen Items
